entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 6.3°C

Humidity: 96 %

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
